SEARCH
Package com.socslingo.controllers.flashcard

Class FlashcardController

java.lang.Object
com.socslingo.controllers.BaseController
com.socslingo.controllers.flashcard.FlashcardController
public class FlashcardController extends BaseController
Controller class for managing flashcard-related interactions.

This class handles the creation, viewing, and navigation of flashcards within the application. It interacts with the FlashcardService to perform database operations and manages UI transitions.

Since:
2024-09-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
TEAM-SOCSLINGO

  • Constructor Details

    • FlashcardController

      public FlashcardController(FlashcardService flashcardService)
      Constructs a new FlashcardController with the specified FlashcardService.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded. It sets up the sidebar and logs initialization details.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class BaseController

    • handleSaveFlashcardAction

      public void handleSaveFlashcardAction()
      Handles the action of saving a new flashcard.

      This method retrieves the input from the front and back text fields, validates the input, hashes the password, and saves the flashcard using the FlashcardService.

    • handleViewFlashcardsAction

      public void handleViewFlashcardsAction()
      Handles the action of viewing all flashcards for the current user.

      This method retrieves flashcards from the FlashcardService and displays the first flashcard if available.

    • handleNextFlashcardAction

      public void handleNextFlashcardAction()
      Handles the action of displaying the next flashcard.

      This method transitions to the next flashcard in the list with a fade animation.

    • handlePreviousFlashcardAction

      public void handlePreviousFlashcardAction()
      Handles the action of displaying the previous flashcard.

      This method transitions to the previous flashcard in the list with a fade animation.

    • handlePreviewFlashcardAction

      public void handlePreviewFlashcardAction()
      Handles the action of previewing a flashcard before saving.

      This method retrieves the input from the front and back text fields, validates the input, and displays a preview of the flashcard.

    • setSidebar

      public void setSidebar(javafx.scene.layout.VBox sidebar)
      Sets the sidebar UI component.

      This method injects the sidebar into the sidebar container pane.

      Overrides:
      setSidebar in class BaseController
      Parameters:
      sidebar - the VBox representing the sidebar

    • setSidebarController

      public void setSidebarController(SidebarController sidebarController)
      Sets the sidebar controller.

      This method injects the SidebarController into the flashcard controller.

      Overrides:
      setSidebarController in class BaseController
      Parameters:
      sidebarController - the SidebarController instance
